But as we become more familiar with these systems, their occasional, puzzling failures suggest a gap between their apparent logic and their actual reliability.Amidst this, a critical analysis from Apple researchers, published a couple of months ago, looks increasingly prescient. Their paper, ‚ÄúThe Illusion of Thinking‚Äù, performed a systematic audit of Large Reasoning Models (LRMs), and its conclusions serve as a crucial reality check on the nature of their capabilities.What ‚ÄúThinking‚Äù Looks LikeFor those who may have missed it, the paper‚Äôs focus is on the process, not just the result. description:

content: S.S. Kajla2 min read¬∑Just now--ListenShareChatGPT Goes Local: OpenAI Launches ChatGPT Go in India.A smarter, faster, and more affordable AI experience designed for IndiaPress enter or click to view image in full sizeGenerated By AuthorChatGPT Go is now live in India‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääand it‚Äôs a big deal. OpenAI, through its CEO Sam Altman and product lead Nick Turley, announced the launch of a new subscription tier tailored specifically for Indian users. This move not only shows regional rollout but its strategic plan to make AI tools accessible at a lower cost.The new subscription plan offers significant upgrades: ten times more message capacity, image generations and file uploads compared to the free version. It also doubles the memory context length, letting users have longer and more meaningful conversations. It's interesting to note that Open AI is understanding local needs not just focusing on profits. By launching in India, OpenAI wants to collect feedback before launching affordable plans in other nations.India has long been a hotspot for tech innovation and digital adoption because of its population. Here, millions use AI tools daily So this localized approach could set an example for global tech companies who adapt to emerging markets. The focus on affordability and performance shows a shift from one-size-fits-all models to region-specific solutions.For users, this means better access without breaking the bank especially for Indian students. If this model is successful in India, ChatGPT Go might become a blueprint for other regions. One thing‚Äôs clear: the future of AI is not just global ‚Äî it‚Äôs local too.A Message from AI MindThanks for being a part of our community! title: Era Baru Agen AI Otonom: Dari Operator Hingga Manus, Revolusi Digital 2025
description:
Dunia teknologi sedang memasuki babak baru yang penuh kejutan.

Continue reading on Medium ¬ª
content: Press enter or click to view image in full sizeProfessional AI AgentEra Baru Agen AI Otonom: Dari Operator Hingga Manus, Revolusi Digital 2025RIZKY ARDIANSYAH3 min read¬∑Just now--ShareDunia teknologi sedang memasuki babak baru yang penuh kejutan. Jika selama ini kecerdasan buatan hanya dikenal sebagai asisten digital yang menunggu perintah, kini muncul generasi baru yang jauh lebih mandiri, yakni agen AI otonom.Kehadirannya mengubah cara manusia berinteraksi dengan teknologi, sekaligus memunculkan pertanyaan besar tentang masa depan otomasi, etika, dan regulasi global.Press enter or click to view image in full sizeimage of the Technology Company Namely OpenAISalah satu terobosan datang dari OpenAI yang memperkenalkan Operator, sebuah agen AI yang dapat mengeksekusi tugas langsung di browser. Operator mampu mengisi formulir, menjadwalkan kegiatan, hingga melakukan pemesanan barang tanpa harus terus-menerus diarahkan manusia. Kehadiran Operator pada Januari 2025 menjadi pintu pembuka menuju ChatGPT Agent, sebuah sistem lanjutan yang lebih kompleks dan dirancang untuk mengelola berbagai tugas secara beruntun.Press enter or click to view image in full sizeAI Robot imageTidak hanya itu, dunia juga dikejutkan oleh peluncuran Manus, agen AI otonom buatan perusahaan Butterfly Effect dari Singapura. Manus diluncurkan pada Maret 2025 dan langsung menarik perhatian karena mampu menulis sekaligus menerapkan kode secara mandiri. Manus menjadi simbol nyata bahwa AI tidak lagi hanya membantu, melainkan bisa benar-benar bekerja sendiri dalam menyelesaikan tugas rumit.Press enter or click to view image in full sizeGoogle ImagesInovasi lain datang dari Google DeepMind melalui AlphaEvolve, agen AI yang diperkenalkan pada Mei 2025. AlphaEvolve dirancang sebagai penulis kode otomatis yang mampu menciptakan sekaligus memperbaiki algoritma menggunakan kombinasi model bahasa besar dan teknik evolusioner. Keunggulan ini membuat AlphaEvolve dipandang sebagai lompatan penting dalam pengembangan perangkat lunak tanpa intervensi manusia.Sementara itu, Google juga menguji coba Project Mariner, sebuah prototipe agen web yang bisa melakukan aktivitas sehari-hari di internet seperti belanja online, mengisi formulir, hingga melakukan riset dengan tingkat kemandirian tinggi. Proyek ini saat ini hanya tersedia dalam tahap uji terbatas, namun potensinya untuk mengubah pengalaman digital sangat besar.Press enter or click to view image in full sizeAmazon ImageAmazon Web Services (AWS) tidak ingin ketinggalan dengan memperkenalkan Bedrock AgentCore. Platform ini menawarkan fondasi modular untuk mengembangkan, menyebarkan, dan mengamankan agen AI di tingkat perusahaan. Bedrock AgentCore dipandang sebagai upaya untuk membawa agen AI dari ranah eksperimen menuju penggunaan praktis di dunia bisnis global.Gelombang baru ini menandai perubahan besar dalam cara teknologi bekerja. Agen AI kini bukan lagi sekadar asisten pasif, tetapi mitra digital yang mampu berpikir, mengambil keputusan, dan bertindak secara mandiri. Dampaknya bagi produktivitas bisnis dan efisiensi kerja bisa sangat besar, namun di sisi lain memunculkan tantangan baru mengenai keamanan data, transparansi algoritma, serta potensi penyalahgunaan.Bagi Indonesia, perkembangan ini menjadi pengingat penting bahwa negara tidak boleh hanya menjadi konsumen teknologi. Dengan sumber daya manusia yang besar dan kreativitas yang melimpah, Indonesia memiliki peluang untuk berperan aktif dalam mengembangkan agen AI lokal sekaligus menyiapkan regulasi yang mampu mengimbangi percepatan inovasi global.Tahun 2025 akan dikenang sebagai era ketika kecerdasan buatan mulai berdiri di atas kakinya sendiri. Dari Operator hingga Manus, dari AlphaEvolve hingga AgentCore, setiap inovasi menunjukkan bahwa masa depan digital bukan lagi tentang instruksi, melainkan kolaborasi antara manusia dan AI otonom.Pertanyaannya kini bukan apakah kita siap, tetapi bagaimana kita memastikan bahwa lompatan besar ini berjalan aman, bermanfaat, dan seimbang bagi semua.

title: Can You Buy Private Jet Charters with Cryptocurrency?

content: Can You Buy Private Jet Charters with Cryptocurrency?James Ison3 min read¬∑Just now--ListenSharePress enter or click to view image in full sizeThe 0.1% Group has provides clients with the option to purchase private jet charters using cryptocurrency for several years. According to James Ison, Director of the 0.1% Group, payment through cryptocurrencies has influenced how clients book and pay for flights; since 2020, nearly 60% of their private jet charters have been paid with cryptocurrency. As the popularity and value of cryptocurrencies increase, the company has adopted crypto payments to offer clients additional payment that are secure and efficient options when booking jets.Why pay for a private jet charter with cryptocurrency?Cryptocurrency can be used as an alternative to traditional payment methods, offering several beneficial features.Convenience and Speed:Payments made with cryptocurrency typically process faster than those using conventional methods. The blockchain operates continuously, allowing transactions at any time globally. Additionally, some users can avoid card fees, wire transfer fees, or currency exchange costs that may be associated with third parties. Once a payment is processed, jet bookings are generally confirmed quickly, which can facilitate last-minute reservations.Security and Privacy:Cryptocurrency transactions are often cited for their enhanced security and privacy. Due to the decentralized characteristics of blockchain technology, only the buyer and the private jet brokerage are involved in the transaction and associated personal information.Global Accessibility:Cryptocurrency payments enable clients to book private jet charters from various locations without concerns about currency conversion or banking limitations. For instance, individuals can arrange flights between the United States, Europe, or Asia using this method, potentially streamlining the booking process.Press enter or click to view image in full sizeWhat cryptocurrency can you use to pay for a private jet charter?At The 0.1% Group all major cryptocurrencies and stablecoins are accepted to buy private jet charters. These include:Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP, Solana and the stablecoins USDT and USDC.How does the process work to charter a jet with cryptocurrency?Request a quoteContact The 0.1% Group jet team or use the booking tool on the website to submit your flight request. Provide details such as route, number of passengers, and travel date. The team will then suggest suitable aircraft options according to your requirements and budget.2. Transactions are recorded on the blockchain upon initiation.4. Confirm the bookingWhen your cryptocurrency payment has been processed, your private jet charter will be booked. Preparations for your flight can then commence.Why choose The 0.1% Group to buy private jet charters with cryptocurrency?As a company committed to supporting cryptocurrency integration, The 0.1% Group enables clients to utilise crypto payments for any service they request. By partnering exclusively with leading private jet providers globally, The 0.1% Group offers a premium payment solution through its dedicated cryptocurrency option for private jet services.
